short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, manage, and search prompts with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Acid Prompt PRO users have access to our custom extension.  This extension is perfect to storing prompts or prompt bits.  Access often used prompts or prompt bits.
